name: Oxygen at The O2
content_summary: [Skip to main content](https://oxygenactiveplay.co.uk/oxygenactiveplay.co.uk#main) Sun 7th Sept – Due to planned Tube strikes Oxygen at the O2 will close for BIG-TIME fun at 4pm, with the last session starting at 3pm, on Sun 7th Sept. To avoid disappointment, we recommend jumpers use alternative forms of transport to visit us on this day. [Dismiss alert](https://oxygenactiveplay.co.uk/oxygenactiveplay.co.uk) Oxygen at The O2 Activity Park Trampolining, a Ninja warrior course, and a high ropes 'a...
